tabler 0.1.0
  • Reference

Create a Tabler Dashboard Page

Source: R/core.R
shiny-page.Rd

Main function to create a complete dashboard page with Tabler theme

Container for dashboard content

Displays a prominent title and subtitle at the top of the page

Top navigation bar for the dashboard

Footer for the dashboard

Vertical sidebar for navigation

Container for navigation items in sidebar

Container for navigation items in horizontal layout

Individual navigation item for sidebar

Container for multiple tab panels in tabbed layouts

Individual tab panel content

Usage

tabler_page(
  title = NULL,
  navbar = NULL,
  body = NULL,
  footer = NULL,
  layout = "boxed"
)

tabler_body(..., class = NULL)

tabler_page_header(title, subtitle = NULL, ...)

tabler_navbar(title = NULL, brand_image = NULL, ...)

tabler_footer(left = NULL, right = NULL)

tabler_sidebar(..., title = NULL, brand_image = NULL, theme = "dark")

sidebar_menu(...)

horizontal_menu(...)

menu_item(text, tab_name = NULL, icon = NULL, href = NULL, badge = NULL)

tabler_tab_items(...)

tabler_tab_item(tab_name, ...)

Arguments

title

Brand title/text for sidebar header

navbar

Dashboard navbar/menu. Can be: - `tablerNavbar()` for top navigation bar (most layouts) - `tablerSidebar()` for vertical sidebar (vertical layouts) - `horizontalMenu()` for horizontal menu (horizontal layout only)

body

Dashboard body content

footer

Dashboard footer (optional)

layout

Layout type: "boxed", "combo", "condensed", "fluid", "fluid-vertical", "horizontal", "navbar-dark", "navbar-overlap", "navbar-sticky", "rtl", "vertical", "vertical-right", "vertical-transparent"

...

Content for this tab

class

Additional CSS classes

subtitle

Optional subtitle or description

brand_image

URL or path to brand image

left

Left-aligned content

right

Right-aligned content

theme

Sidebar theme: "light" or "dark"

text

Item text/label

tab_name

Unique identifier for the tab (must match menuItem tab_name)

icon

Icon name (optional)

href

Link URL (optional, alternative to tab_name)

badge

Badge text (optional)

Value

HTML tag with dependencies attached

A Shiny tag representing the body

A Shiny tag representing the page header

A Shiny tag representing the navbar

A Shiny tag representing the footer

A Shiny tag representing the sidebar

A Shiny tag representing the sidebar menu

A Shiny tag representing the horizontal menu

A Shiny tag representing the menu item

A Shiny tag representing the tab items container

A Shiny tag representing the tab item

Examples

ui <- tabler_page(
  title = "Combo Dashboard",
  layout = "combo",
  navbar = list(
    top = tabler_navbar(title = "My App"),
    side = tabler_sidebar(
      sidebar_menu(
        menu_item("Dogs", icon = "dog"),
        menu_item("Cats", icon = "cat")
      )
    )
  ),
  body = tabler_body("Welcome to Tabler!")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {}

# shiny::shinyApp(ui, server)
